rationale: The species has a wide distribution in the <span>Lower Mekong, including tributaries, the upper parts of the Chao  Phraya basins and the Maeklong drainage. There is no information available on threats to the species, however it is considered Least Concern at present on the basis of its wide distribution.
evaluator: Kottelat, M., Vidthayanon, C. & Smith, K.
